name: Oblation.
description:
The overworld door has been opened.

The gods are watching you.

This prayer simulator was made in literary 5 hours for LDJAM #44 Your life is currency

Play it at LD site https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/oblation-1

Credits:

code and art: maruki - http://twitter.com/marukihurakami

additional js: sugoidev - http://twitter.com/sugoidev

palette greyt-bit by Sam Keddy - https://twitter.com/skeddles

music "lofi hip hop" by omfgdude - https://opengameart.org/users/omfgdude

"ambient bird sounds" by isaiah658 - https://opengameart.org/users/isaiah658
